text: "Living Next Door to Alice" is a 1972 song co-written by Nicky Chinn and Mike Chapman. It was originally released as a single by Australian band New World and went to number 35 in Australia. It was made famous by British band Smokie in 1976 for their third studio album Midnight Caf√©. It went to number 1 in Germany, Switzerland, Austria, Ireland, the Netherlands and Norway. ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:Smokie (band) songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Folk rock songs
title: Living Next Door to Alice
